text: Aur Allah ki raah mein wesa hi jihad kero jesay jihad ka haq hai ussi ney tumhen bargazeedah banaya hai aur tum per deen kay baray mein koi tangi nahi daali deen apnay baap ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ka qaeem rakho ussi Allah ney tumhara naam musalman rakha hai iss quran say pehlay aur iss mein bhi takay payghumbar tum per gawah hojaye aur tum tamam logon kay gawah bann jao. Pus tumhen chahiye kay namazen qaeen rakho aur zakat ada kertay raho aur Allah ko mazboor thaam lo wohi tumhara wali aur malik hai. Pus kiya hi acha malik hai aur kitna hi behtar madadgar hai
